long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gives togglable options to enhance dark mode on Floatplane and option to auto-select captioned Floatplane videos, and make comment-based timestamps clickable.

This extension is not affiliated nor endorsed by Floatplane Media Inc. or Linus Media Group, and is instead just a project to upgrade the user experience.
